OOC: Do you realize this may be the first rpg battle
I've ever won?

BIC:  Sunhawk fires 8 more shots and starts running to
make it impossible to take out him and Kup together.

--- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote:
> ooC: Several hundered metres is a fair distance for
> one post.
> Hottie, Predacons don't often just switch sides
> cause they feel like 
> it. Rage won't likely be to welcomed. Besides, the
> Predacons rather 
> under manned right now.
> 
> -- Megatron --
> 
> Megatron curses at Warhead's predicament, hoping
> backwards away from 
> the Maximals. As the number of Maximals converging
> on his location 
> increases, his frown deepens. 
> 
> Spotting the insolent Maximal who had hit him with a
> laser, Kup, he 
> fires two missiles at the bot.
> 
> Sunhawk's laser shots scream past Megatron, one
> hitting him in the 
> chest, another charring his arm and almost causing
> him to drop 
> Warhead. Distracted by Sunhawks shots, Kup's laser
> blast hits him in 
> the side of the head, disabling his left optic, and
> damaging his 
> right one fairly severly. Megatron spots Hot Rod
> aiming and firing, 
> and he quickly moves Warhead's unmoving form infront
> of him to 
> intercept the weaponfire, "Grr, at least he proved
> useful," mutters 
> Megatron.
> 
> Seeing an opertunity, he leaps into the air,
> throwing Warhead above 
> him, then transforms into Dragon mode, catching
> Warhead with his 
> clawed legs.
> 
>
